comments:
HEAD, found in smoke test http://www.eclipse.org/jdt/ui/smoke-test/smoke.html

Select two equal (e.g. empty) folders in Navigator view and choose context menu > Compare With > Each Other.

The problem is that the "Opening Compare Editor" Job is not run in the UI. Furthermore, the parent shell should not be taken from the active workbench window, but from the given workbench page.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2006-11-21 12:15:04.109
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Opening Compare Editor".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IconAndMessageDialog.getSWTImage(IconAndMessageDialog.java:270)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IconAndMessageDialog.getInfoImage(IconAndMessageDialog.java:237)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.MessageDialog.<init>(MessageDialog.java:145)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.MessageDialog.openInformation(MessageDialog.java:338)
	at org.eclipse.compare.internal.CompareUIPlugin$1.run(CompareUIPlugin.java:427)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
